metadata.title: CVE-2016-9480 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libdwarf 2016-10-21 allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation or cause a denial of service by using the "malformed dwarffile" approach, related to a "Heap Buffer Over-read" issue affecting thedwarf_util.c component, aka DW201611-006.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
